reference.title: cxxUnionRef
reference.shortdesc: This element provides a C++ union topic type as a link in a DITA map.

section.title: Description
section.p: A <cxxUnionRef> can contain other <cxxUnionRef> elements or <cxxClassRef> and <cxxStructRef> elements; allowing you to express navigation or table-of-contents hierarchies.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxAPIMap id="amap" title="AMap"> <cxxFileRef href="afile.xml" navtitle="afile.h" /> <cxxClassRef href="aclass.xml" navtitle="AClass" /> <cxxStructRef href="astruct.xml" navtitle="AClass::AStruct" /> <cxxUnionRef href="aunion.xml" navtitle="AClass::AUnion" /> <cxxNamespaceRef href="anamespace.xml" navtitle="AClass::ANamespace" /> </cxxAPIMap>
